inscription: Inscribed on reverse: "M.r de Neuville S.gr dis[']le Capitaine d'artillerie, fermier Général, né en 1701, mort en 1780"
provenance: ?possibly Jacques-Victor, comte de la Béraudière [1808-1884], château de Bouzillé, near Angers, France (until d. 1884); ? possibly by descent, his son, comte de la Béraudière, château de Bouzillé; his wife, Marie-Thérèse, comtesse de la Béraudière, Paris (until d. 1930; sale, 1925, Galerie Georges Petit, Paris, no. 18, ill., bought in; her sale, American Art Association, New York, December 13, 1930, no. 413, ill., for $400); [Arnold Seligmann, New York, 1931; sold, for $2,000 to Mia]
title: Portrait Bust of M. de Neuville, Captain of Artillery and Comptroller General
